mapper.sql: distinct b.org_name AS "issueOrgName", c.org_name AS "billOrgName", o.name AS "settOrgCode"

a.sett_date AS "settDate", a.trade_type AS "tradeType", a.issue_org_code AS "issueOrgCode", b.org_name AS "issueOrgName", a.bill_org_code AS "billOrgCode", c.org_name AS "billOrgName", a.card_no AS "cardNo", a.before_trade_charge/100 AS "beforeTradeCharge", a.trade_charge/100 AS "tradeCharge", a.trade_date AS "tradeDate", a.trade_time AS "tradeTime", a.service_charge/100 AS "serviceCharge", a.issue_charge/100 AS "issueCharge", a.bill_charge/100 AS "billCharge", a.center_charge/100 AS "centerCharge", a.sett_charge/100 AS "settCharge", o.name AS "settOrgCode", a.roam_type AS "roamType", decode(a.roam_type,'1','省内跨地市','2','省外','无') AS "roamTypeName"
